atha kho pāyāsi rājañño uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ āmantāpetvā etad'avoca, saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, tāta uttara, dānaṃ datvā evaṃ anuddisasi
bhikkhū ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanaṃ uttiṇam'akaṃsu.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
tathārūpesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddh'aggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ.

mettañ'ca sabbalokasmiṃ, mānasam'bhāvaye aparimāṇaṃ;
uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañ'ca, asambādhaṃ, averaṃ, asapattaṃ.
amhākaṃ pana sakiṃ katāni santhatāni pañca'pi cha'pi vassāni honti, yesaṃ no dārakā uhadanti'pi ummihanti'pi undūrehi'pi khajjanti.
yathā vārivahā pūrā paripūrenti sāgaraṃ, evam'eva ito dinnaṃ petānaṃ upakappati.

yathā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānamhi, careyya anupāhano.
satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna, evaṃ gāme munī care.
nandopanandabhujagaṃ vibudhaṃ mah'iddhiṃ, puttena therabhujagena dam'āpayanto, iddh'ūpadesavidhinā jitavā mun'indo
chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mahānāme sakke upanandhiṃsu.
nissayapaccayo, upanissayapaccayo, purejātapaccayo, pacchājātapaccayo, āsevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipākapaccayo, āhārapaccayo
dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa param'atthapāramiyo'ti
yathā paccayaṃ pavattamānaṃ dhātumattam'ev'etaṃ, yad idaṃ piṇḍapāto tad upabhuñjako ca puggalo, dhātumattako nissatto nijjīvo suñño,
aññataro bhikkhu heṭṭhā hutvā silaṃ uccāresi. uparimena bhikkhunā duggahitā silā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthāsi. so bhikkhu kālamakāsi
yam'pi tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubb'eva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisatto'va samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa upar'ūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena
sakkatvā dhammaratanaṃ, osadhaṃ uttamaṃ varaṃ, pariḷāh'ūpasamanaṃ. dhammatejena sotthinā nassant'upaddavā sabbe, bhayā vūpasamentu te.
dhammo ca desito niyyāniko upasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito
ahaṃ, bhante, pāpakammaṃ akāsiṃ gārayhaṃ upavajjaṃ. yena me āyasmanto attamanā honti taṃ karomī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhu, telañ'ca paṭicca vaṭṭiñ'ca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyati, tass'eva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā aññassa ca anupahārā anāhāro nibbāyati.
etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upāli
n'āhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjan'ādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmī'ti evam'ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
uppannā dhammā. anuppannā dhammā. uppādino dhammā.
ubhatobhāgavimutto idha ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya c'assa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
amhākaṃ pana sakiṃ katāni santhatāni pañca'pi cha'pi vassāni honti, yesaṃ no dārakā uhadanti'pi ummihanti'pi undūrehi'pi khajjanti.
atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussāhetvā tuleti, tulayitvā padahati,
amhākaṃ pana sakiṃ katāni santhatāni pañca'pi cha'pi vassāni honti, yesaṃ no dārakā uhadanti'pi ummihanti'pi undūrehi'pi khajjanti.

ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vā'pi,
yo'dha pāṇaṃ vihiṃsati,
yassa pāṇe dayā n'atthi,
taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasata-ekūnacattāḷīsati saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, ekūnatiṃsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
ek'ūnatiṃsatime saṃvacchare mah'ābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā, chabbassāni mahāpadānaṃ padahitvā
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasata-ekūnasata saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, ekūnavīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaramānā anussaranti sabb'ete pañc'upādānakkhandhe anussaranti etesaṃ vā aññataraṃ.

na munī gāmam'āgamma, kulesu sahasā care.
ghās'esanaṃ chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe.
evam'ayaṃ puggalo āyatiṃ aparihānadhammo bhavissatī'ti.
kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ āyasmato anuruddhassa evam'ārocimha, imāsañ'ca imāsañ'ca vihārasamāpattīnaṃ mayaṃ lābhino'ti
ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavā hohi, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharāhi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesū'ti
tesaṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyataṃ acchādesi, taṇhā ca tesaṃ okkami.
cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa.
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.
ayañ'ca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi appamāṇo ca oḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamm'eva devānaṃ dev'ānubhāvaṃ.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
adāsi me akāsi me, ñātimittā sakhā ca me. petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā, pubbe katam'anussaraṃ.
katame cattāro? kabaḷīkāro āhāro, oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
uposathakaraṇato pubbe navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti
atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante paṭhame yāme, uṭṭhāy'āsanā ek'aṃsaṃ uttar'āsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā ten'añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca
uposathakammassa pattakallattaṃ viditvā idāni kariyamāno uposatho saṅghena anumānetabbo.
handa mayaṃ buddhassa bhagavato pubbabhāganamakāraṃ karomase
janapadakalyāṇī naccati gāyatī'ti kho, bhikkhave, bhiyyosomattāya mahājanakāyo sannipateyya.
seyyathā'pi balavā saṅkhadhamo appakasiren'eva catuddisā viññāpeyya, evam'eva kho evaṃ bhāvitāya mettāya cetovimuttiyā yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ na taṃ tatr'āvasissati, na taṃ tatr'āvatiṭṭhati.

na kahāpaṇavassena, titti kāmesu vijjati.
appassādā dukhā kāmā, iti viññāya paṇḍito
taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban'ti
yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasañhito
kusalā cetanā kām'āvacarā rūp'āvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā, ayaṃ vuccati puññ'ābhisaṅkhāro.
tattha katamo kāyasaṅkhāro? kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsañcetanā vacīsaṅkhāro, manosañcetanā cittasaṅkhāro.
kāyaviveko ca vūpakaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhamm'ābhiratānaṃ
yācitak'ūpamā kāmā tāvakālik'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
yāvatā, bhikkhave, kāsikosalā, yāvatā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vijitaṃ, rājā tattha pasenadi kosalo aggam'akkhāyati.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi phussamāsassa kāḷapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

kileseh'ābhibhūtā te, tena tena vidhāvitā.
narā kilesavatthūsu, sasaṅgāme'va ghosite.
kiṃ nu kujjhasi mā kujjhi, akkodho tissa te varaṃ

kumbh'ūpamaṃ kāyam'imaṃ viditvā, nagar'ūpamaṃ cittam'idaṃ ṭhapetvā.
yodhetha māraṃ paññ'āvudhena, jitañ'ca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
na arahati bhavaṃ kūṭadanto samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ. samaṇo tv'eva gotamo arahati bhavantaṃ kūṭadantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ
aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño'ti! iti h'idaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa aññāsikoṇḍañño' tv'eva nāmaṃ ahosī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, āvuso, balavā puriso tiṇhena khaggena muddhani abhimattheyya, evam'eva kho, āvuso, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.

sītañ'ca uṇhañ'ca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vāt'ātape ḍaṃsasarīsape ca.
sabbāni'p'etāni abhisambhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
yo pana bhikkhu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatiṃ jāyattane vā jārattane vā, antamaso taṅ'khaṇikāya'pi, saṅghādiseso.
idam'pi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍam'pi chiddam'pi sabalam'pi kammāsam'pi.
gacchatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā
tena kho pana samayena āyasmā khemako badarik'ārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
duggāhadiṭṭhibhujagena sudaṭṭhahatthaṃ, brahmaṃ visuddhijutim'iddhibak'ābhidhānaṃ, ñāṇāgadena vidhinā jitavā mun'indo

tasmā hi attakāmena, mahattam'abhikaṅkhatā.
saddhammo garukātabbo, saraṃ buddhāna sāsanan'ti.
atha kiñ'carahi ty'āyaṃ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ek'aṃso gahito, sīhanādo nadito
api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā
gacchatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.
yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasiṅghāṭake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatacatuttiṃsati saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
ajj'uposatho catuddaso
yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharīṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ, gaṇhāhi, bhante, yadicchasī'ti
catur'āsītisahassadhammakkhandh'ānubhāvena piṭakattay'ānubhavena jinasāvak'ānubhāvena
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.

kikī'va aṇḍaṃ, camarī'va vāladhiṃ. piyaṃ'va puttaṃ,
nayanaṃ'va ekakaṃ. tath'eva sīlaṃ, anurakkhamānā.
idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. ayaṃ vuccati, gahapati, cāgasampadā.
niṭṭhite ca pubbakicce, sace so divaso cātuddasīpaṇṇarasīsāmaggīnam'aññataro, yath'ājja uposatho cātuddaso.
cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahassaṃ yāmānaṃ sahassaṃ tusitānaṃ sahassaṃ nimmānaratīnaṃ
so sīlavā samāno bhabbo ariyānaṃ a'dassanakamyataṃ pahātuṃ ariyadhammassa a'sotukamyataṃ pahātuṃ upārambhacittataṃ pahātuṃ.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare gimhānautu. asmiṃ utumhi cittamāsassa kāḷapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.

alattakakatā pādā, mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhitaṃ.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.

alattakakatā pādā, mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhitaṃ.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhe cuddasamaṃ, candavāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ avidūre nisinnaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
bhante nāgasena, kiṃlakkhaṇā cetanā'ti? cetayitalakkhaṇā, mahārāja, cetanā abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā cā'ti.

sace enti manussattaṃ,
dalidde jāyare kule,
coḷaṃ piṇḍo ratī khiḍḍā,
yattha kicchena labbhati.
upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvar'atthāya chandakaṃ saṃharitvā, aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ
pānīyaparibhojanīyaupaṭṭhapanañ'ca, chand'ārahānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ chand'āharaṇañ'ca, tesaññ'eva akat'uposathānaṃ pārisuddhiyā'pi āharaṇañ'ca
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, chabbīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, chav'ālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ, n'eva gāme kaṭṭh'atthaṃ pharati, n'āraññe kaṭṭh'atthaṃ pharati.
idam'pi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍam'pi chiddam'pi sabalam'pi kammāsam'pi.

aciraṃ vat'ayaṃ kāyo, paṭhaviṃ adhisessati.
chuḍḍho apetaviññāṇo, niratthaṃ'va kaliṅgaraṃ.

vitakk'ūpasame ca yo rato, asubhaṃ bhāvayate sadā sato,
esa kho byanti kāhiti, esa checchati mārabandhanaṃ.
jayanto bodhiyā mūle, sakyānaṃ nandivaḍḍhano. evaṃ tvaṃ vijayo hohi, jayassu jayamaṅgale.
seyyathā'pi gimhānaṃ pacchime māse ūhataṃ rajojallaṃ, tam'enaṃ mahāakālamegho ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasameti
evaṃ rāg'ādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattam'eva me javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇ'appamāṇen'eva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmī'ti.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni

kusalānañ'ca dhammānaṃ, paññāya ca parikkhayā.
sabb'ākāravar'ūpetaṃ, lujjate jinasāsanaṃ.
dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati n'ādhimuccati na sampasīdati, kos'ohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahūtajivhatāya ca.

jīno rath'assaṃ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca that'eva jīno.
sabbesu bhogesu asesitesu, kasmā na santappasi sokakāle.
jīvit'indriyaṃ, sukh'indriyaṃ, dukkh'indriyaṃ, somanass'indriyaṃ, domanass'indriyaṃ, upekkh'indriyaṃ
saddhammasenā sugatānugo, yo lokassa pāp'ūpakilesajetā, santo sayaṃ santiniyojako ca, svākkhātadhammaṃ viditaṃ karoti
rājā disampati bhavantaṃ jotipālaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantayati
icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tumhaṃ khippam'eva samijjhatu, sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando paṇṇaraso yathā, maṇi jotiraso yathā
so ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito, petāna'pūjā ca katā uḷārā. balañ'ca bhikkhūnam'anuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakan'ti.
supaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujupaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyapaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcipaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho

papañ'ca udapānañ'ca, ye dadanti upassayaṃ.
tesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā, te janā saggagāmino'ti.
are bāla, brāhmaṇa, kiṃ tava ñātakā antaradvāre kahāpaṇaṃ ṭhapenti, parato maṃ harā'ti
ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.
sagge kāme ca rūpe, girisikharataṭe c'antalikkhe vimāne, dīpe raṭṭhe ca gāme, taruvanagahane, gehavatthumhi khette

tatr'ābhiratim'iccheyya, hitvā kāme akiñcano,
pariyodapeyya attānaṃ, cittaklesehi paṇḍito.
so tathāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti
dhammo padīpo viya tassa satthuno, yo maggapāk'āmatabhedabhinnako, lok'uttaro yo ca tad'attha'dīpano

sīlaṃ rakkheyya medhāvī,
patthayāno tayo sukhe,
pasaṃsaṃ vittalābhañ'ca,
pecca sagge pamodanaṃ.
yācitak'ūpamā kāmā tāvakālik'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
te tāvataken'eva attamanā assu, alam'ettāvatā, katam'ettāvatā, anuppatto no sāmaññ'attho, n'atthi no kiñci uttarikaraṇīyan'ti.
na jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. yo paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa. anujānāmi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ, adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitan'ti.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
yāvakīvañ'ca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evan'tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādas'ākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi,
ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesam'pi ekajjhaṃ sen'āsanaṃ paññapeti, im'āyap'ime āyasmanto ratiyā acchissantī'ti.

yesaṃ sattati piyāni, sattati tesaṃ dukkhāni,
yesaṃ saṭṭhi piyāni, saṭṭhi tesaṃ dukkhāni,
yesaṃ paññāsaṃ piyāni, paññāsaṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni

katā me rakkhā katā me parittā, paṭikkamantu bhūtāni.
so'haṃ namo bhagavato, namo sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā sattabojjh'aṅge paripūrenti.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, sattarasadivasāni atikkantāni.
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, sattavīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
upakkhalitvā vā papateyyaṃ, bhattaṃ vā me bhuttaṃ byāpajjeyya, pittaṃ vā me kuppeyya, semhaṃ vā me kuppeyya, satthakā vā me vātā kuppeyyuṃ
so taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. so tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati
asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ kiles'uppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena sadosagamanena gacchatī'ti samuddan'aṭṭhena'pi samuddo.

sabbhi'r'eva samāsetha,
sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṃ,
sataṃ saddhammam'aññāya,
seyyo hoti na pāpiyo'ti.
yathā vā pan'eke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
alam'eva saddhāpabbajitena kulaputtena vīriyaṃ ārabhituṃ

saddhāvimutto idha ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya c'assa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, tathāgate c'assa saddhā niviṭṭhā hoti mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā.
tam'mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ sadhammaṃ sasaṅghaṃ, imehi sakkārehi yath'ārahaṃ āropitehi abhipūjayāma
sanidassanasappaṭighā dhammā. anidassanasappaṭighā dhammā. anidassan'āppaṭighā dhammā.

jīno rath'assaṃ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca that'eva jīno.
sabbesu bhogesu asesitesu, kasmā na santappasi sokakāle.
diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma tatth'eva uppannaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātaṃ cittattayaṃ.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū abhiṇhaṃ sannipātā bhavissanti sannipātabahulā, vuddhi'y'eva pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

et'ādisāni katvāna, sabbattha'm'aparājitā.
sabbattha sotthiṃ gacchanti, taṃ tesaṃ maṅgalam'uttaman'ti.

sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalass'ūpasampadā.
sacittapariyodapanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ.
yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpe rūpamattam'eva passati, na anicc'ādisabhāvaṃ, evam'eva sesaṃ.
hetupaccayo, ārammaṇapaccayo, adhipatipaccayo, anantarapaccayo, samanantarapaccayo, sahajātapaccayo, aññam'aññapaccayo
ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ attānaṃ samanupassamānā samanupassanti, sabb'ete pañc'upādānakkhandhe samanupassanti, etesaṃ vā aññataraṃ.

na ca khuddaṃ samācare kiñci, yena viññū pare upavadeyyuṃ.
sukhino vā khemino hontu, sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhit'attā.
sambahulā bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññik'aṅgaṃ piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu
pharitvāna mettaṃ samettā bhadantā avikkhittacittā parittaṃ bhaṇantu
yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatī'ti yo taṃ cakkhusamudde samosaṭaṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ
ayañ'ca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi appamāṇo ca oḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamm'eva devānaṃ dev'ānubhāvaṃ.
diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma tatth'eva uppannaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātaṃ cittattayaṃ.
sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā. adukkham'asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā.
ayañ'ca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi appamāṇo ca oḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamm'eva devānaṃ dev'ānubhāvaṃ.
evaṃ hi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ. att'atthaṃ vā hi bhikkhave sampassamānena alam'eva appamādena sampādetuṃ
api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati.
ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.

etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇam'uttamaṃ,
etaṃ saraṇam'āgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccati.

dumapphalānī'va patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā.
etam'pi disvā pabbajito'mhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññam'eva seyyo.
puna caparaṃ bhikkhu seyyathā'pi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ ek'āhamataṃ vā dvī'hamataṃ vā tī'hamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ.
hetupaccayo, ārammaṇapaccayo, adhipatipaccayo, anantarapaccayo, samanantarapaccayo, sahajātapaccayo, aññam'aññapaccayo
ek'ūnatiṃsatime saṃvacchare mah'ābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā, chabbassāni mahāpadānaṃ padahitvā
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.
tattha, sātthakasampajaññaṃ, sappāyasampajaññaṃ, gocarasampajaññaṃ, asammohasampajaññaṃ'ti catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ.
ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.
appamattako so kaliggaho yaṃ so akkhadhutto paṭhamen'eva kaliggahena puttam'pi jīyetha, dāram'pi jīyetha, sabbaṃ sāpateyyam'pi jīyetha, uttari'pi adhibandhaṃ nigaccheyya.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū āraññakesu sen'āsanesu sāpekkhā bhavissanti, vuddhi'y'eva pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni
atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū taṃ sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ ādāya nāvāya sahajātiṃ ujjaviṃsu
supaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujupaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyapaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcipaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
gopālako sāyanhasamaye sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati, ajja kho gāvo amukasmiñ'ca amukasmiñ'ca padese cariṃsu

yān'imāni apatthāni, alābūn'eva sārade,
kāpotakāni aṭṭhīni, tāni disvāna kā rati.
yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, atari cakkhusamuddaṃ saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sagāhaṃ sarakkhasaṃ.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
ettāvatā ca amhehi sambhataṃ puññasampadaṃ sabbe devā anumodantu sabbasampattisiddhiyā.

tato pāsādikaṃ āsi, gataṃ bhuttaṃ nisevitaṃ.
siniddhā teladhārā'va, ahosi iriyāpatho.

tam'ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ abhipūjayāmi
tam'ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ sirasā namāmi
ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa
kusalā cetanā kām'āvacarā rūp'āvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā, ayaṃ vuccati puññ'ābhisaṅkhāro.
tatr'aññatarassa thalaṭṭhassa purisassa evam'assa, pāpakaṃ vata, bho, ayaṃ puriso kammaṃ akāsi gārayhaṃ sīsacchejjaṃ.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi māghamāsassa sukkapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
dhammo ca desito niyyāniko upasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito
sādhu no bhante bhagavā suciraparinibbuto'pi pacchimājanat'ānukampamānasā

māno hi te brāhmaṇa khāribhāro, kodho dhūmo bhasmani mosavajjaṃ.
jivhā sujā hadayaṃ jotiṭhānaṃ, attā sudanto purisassa joti.
ye te sutt'antā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīr'atthā lok'uttarā suññatappaṭisaṃyuttā, tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti na sotaṃ odahissanti
duggāhadiṭṭhibhujagena sudaṭṭhahatthaṃ, brahmaṃ visuddhijutim'iddhibak'ābhidhānaṃ, ñāṇāgadena vidhinā jitavā mun'indo
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.

seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare esikā hoti gambhīranemā sunikhātā acalā asampavedhī abbhantarānaṃ guttiyā bāhirānaṃ paṭighātāya. evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ
ayañ'ca kho dakkhiṇā dinnā, saṅghamhi suppatiṭṭhitā. dīgharattaṃ hitāy'assa, ṭhānaso upakappati.
sunakkhattaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ, supabhātaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ. sukhaṇo sumuhutto ca, suyiṭṭhaṃ brahmacārisu.
iminā puññakammena, iminā uddissena ca khipp'āhaṃ sulabhe c'eva taṇh'ūpādānachedanaṃ.
buddho susuddho karuṇāmah'aṇṇavo, yo'ccantasuddhabbarañāṇalocano, lokassa pāp'ūpakilesaghātako
ahi āviñcheyya vammikaṃ pavekkhāmī'ti, susumāro āviñcheyya udakaṃ pavekkhāmī'ti, pakkhī āviñcheyya ākāsaṃ ḍessāmī'ti

karaṇīyam'atthakusalena, yaṃ taṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca:
sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, suvaco c'assa mudu, anatimānī.
atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etad'avoca, kiṃ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, ahaṃ sūcivāṇijako, tvaṃ sūcikāro, udāhu ahaṃ sūcikāro, tvaṃ sūcivāṇijako'ti?
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.
yesaṃ mayaṃ paribhuñjāma cīvarapiṇḍapātasen'āsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ tesaṃ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mah'ānisaṃsā'ti

ye ca atītā sambuddhā, ye ca buddhā anāgatā.
yo c'eta'r'ahi sambuddho, bahunnaṃ sokanāsano.
cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokasallaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati soko.

ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, na'y'idha paññāyetha mātā'ti vā mātucchā'ti vā mātulānī'ti vā ācariyabhariyā'ti vā garūnaṃ dārā'ti vā. sambhedaṃ loko agamissa, yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
tathārūpesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddh'aggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ.
āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā vassasatikaṃ vā jātiyā jiṇṇaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ bhoggaṃ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ pavedhamānaṃ gacchantaṃ
tattha katamo kāyasaṅkhāro? kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsañcetanā vacīsaṅkhāro, manosañcetanā cittasaṅkhāro.
gahaṭṭhapaṇḍak'ādayo ekavīsati vajjanīyā puggalā hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena vajjetabbā. te asmiṃ na honti.

nekatikā vañcanikā, kūṭasakkhī apāṭukā.
bahūhi parikappehi, āmisaṃ paribhuñjare.
āyuvaḍḍhako, dhanavaḍḍhako, sirivaḍḍhako, yasavaḍḍhako, balavaḍḍhako, vaṇṇavaḍḍhako, sukhavaḍḍhako hotu sabbadā
yam'pi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anāḷhiko iṇaṃ ādiyitvā vaḍḍhiṃ paṭissuṇāti, vaḍḍhi'pi, bhikkhave, dukkhā lokasmiṃ kāmabhogino'ti?
saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāya vattato rumhaniyaṃ satthusāsanaṃ hoti ojavantaṃ.

udar'āvadehakaṃ bhutvā, sayant'uttānaseyyakā.
kathaṃ vattenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
namo omak'ātītassa tassa vatthuttayassa'pi. namokārappabhāvena vigacchantu upaddavā.
bhavasātabaddhā'ti. ekaṃ bhavasātaṃ, sukhā vedanā. dve bhavasātāni, sukhā ca vedanā iṭṭhañ'ca vatthu. tīṇi bhavasātāni, yobbaññaṃ, ārogyaṃ, jīvitaṃ.
so kalyāṇamitto samāno bhabbo assaddhiyaṃ pahātuṃ a'vadaññutaṃ pahātuṃ kosajjaṃ pahātuṃ.
icc'evam'ek'anta-abhipūjaneyyakaṃ vatthuttayaṃ vandayat'ābhisaṅkhataṃ
satto'ti laggo. guhāyan'ti kāye. kāyo hi rāg'ādīnaṃ vāḷānaṃ vasan'okāsato guhā'ti vuccati.
pañcacattāḷisasaṃvaccharāni vasitvā, sappasaṃvacchare, vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ bhummavāre parinibbāyi.
evaṃ utuācikkhanaṃ. utūn'īdha pana sāsane hem'antagimhavassānānaṃ vasena tīṇi honti.
aññatarasmiṃ āvāse vass'ūpagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāmo corehi vuṭṭhāsi.
idaṃ me puññaṃ āsavakkhayāvahaṃ hotu, idaṃ me puññaṃ nibbānassa paccayo hotu
etā pi buddhajayamaṅgalaaṭṭhagāthā, yo vācano dinadine sarate'm'atandī, hitvān'anekavividhāni c'upaddavāni, mokkhaṃ sukhaṃ adhigameyya naro sapañño
padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vācākammaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ, padakkhiṇaṃ manokammaṃ paṇīdhi te padakkhiṇe. padakkhiṇāni katvāna, labhant'atthe padakkhiṇe.
ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ. atha kho vāseṭṭho upāsako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
so vikkhittacitto samāno abhabbo ayonisomanasikāraṃ pahātuṃ kummaggasevanaṃ pahātuṃ cetaso līnattaṃ pahātuṃ.

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu.

sahā'v'assa dassanasampadāya, taya'ssu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchitañ'ca, sīlabbataṃ vā pi yad'atthi kiñci.
pañcakkhandhā, rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
namokār'ānubhāvena suvatthi hotu sabbadā. namokārassa tejena vidhimhi homi tejavā
yo cakkhumā mohamal'āpakaṭṭho, sāmaṃ va buddho sugato vimutto, mārassa pāsā vinimocayanto, pāpesi khemaṃ janataṃ vineyyaṃ
sattisūl'ūpamā kāmā vinivijjhan'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
yo cakkhumā mohamal'āpakaṭṭho, sāmaṃ va buddho sugato vimutto, mārassa pāsā vinimocayanto, pāpesi khemaṃ janataṃ vineyyaṃ

na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino.
adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggatiṃ.
jhānapaccayo, maggapaccayo, sampayuttapaccayo, vippayuttapaccayo, atthipaccayo, n'atthipaccayo, vigatapaccayo, avigatapaccayo.

na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti.
appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati paridevo.
yaṃ viditvā sato caran'ti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.
evaṃ rāg'ādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattam'eva me javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇ'appamāṇen'eva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmī'ti.
agge dhamme pasannānaṃ, virāg'ūpasame sukhe. agge saṅghe pasannānaṃ, puññakkhette anuttare.
bojjh'aṅgo satisaṅkhāto dhammānaṃ vicayo tathā viriyam'pītipassaddhi bojjh'aṅgā ca tathā'pare samādh'upekkhabojjh'aṅgā.
yattha jāto bhave bhave ujucitto satipañño sallekho viriyavā'minā.

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.
catūhi mahādevarājūhi kat'āradhanaṃ paṭicca pañca mahāvilokane viloketvā
catūhi mahādevarājūhi kat'āradhanaṃ paṭicca pañca mahāvilokane viloketvā
sayaṃ samattaṃ karoti paripuṇṇaṃ karoti anomaṃ karoti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ karoti.
diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāraṃ diṭṭhivisūkaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ.
na oramattakena vises'ādhigamena antarāvosānaṃ āpajjissanti
atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṃ pavisissāmī'ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahinā puṇṇaṃ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaram'akāsi.
sabb'ītiyo vivajjantu, sabbarogo vinassatu, mā te bhavatv'antarāyo, sukhī dīgh'āyuko bhava.
tena kho pana samayena satta ca jaṭilā satta ca nigaṇṭhā satta ca acelakā satta ca ekasāṭakā satta ca paribbājakā parūḷhakacchanakhalomā khārivividham'ādāya bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.

na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti.
appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.

ete ca ñatvā upanissitā'ti, ñatvā munī nissaye so vimaṃsī,
ñatvā vimutto na vivādam'eti, bhav'ābhavāya na sameti dhīro'ti.
